original_text: They said, ‘This man saved other people, did he? But he cannot save his own life! He says that he is the king of Israel. So he should come down from the cross now. Then we will believe in him.
korean_text: 그가 남은 구원하였으되 자기는 구원할 수 없도다 그가 이스라엘의 왕이로다 지금 십자가에서 내려올지어다 그리하면 우리가 믿겠노라

sentences.original_text: But he cannot save his own life
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 자기 목숨을 구원할 수 없다

sentences.original_text: He says that he is the king of Israel
So he should come down from the cross now
Then we will believe in him
